body:
<BOX layout="column" expand="true" center="false" width="100%" height="100%" color="" radius="0">

</BOX>
BOX (default) [FML].description: A Box with default attributes applied

body:
<BOX layout="column" expand="true" center="true" width="100%" height="100%" color="" radius="0">

</BOX>
BOX (centered-column) [FML].description: A Box with a centered column layout

body:
<BOX layout="row" expand="true" center="true" width="100%" height="100%" color="" radius="0">

</BOX>
BOX (centered-row) [FML].description: A Box with a centered row layout
